item.title: The Theory of a Blockchain Circular Economy - CoinDesk
item.description:
The Theory of a Blockchain Circular Economy - CoinDesk

William Mougayar is the author of "The Business Blockchain", and a board advisor to the Ethereum Foundation, the non-profit that oversees the development of one of two blockchains seeking to popularize the software. In this opinion piece, Mougayar offers his thoughts on the how blockchains and digital currency could change the way we work and how we are compensated.

item.title: Gatecoin to Resume Trading and Funding Activity
item.description:
Gatecoin to Resume Trading and Funding Activity

Gatecoin has recently announced its plans to reopen all activity on Wednesday, August 17th and it will do so without any trading fees September 1st, 2016, in what seems to be an effort to draw clients back to the Hong Kong-based exchange.

item.title: Bitcoin Savings Firm Magnr Suspends Trading to Evaluate Security - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Savings Firm Magnr Suspends Trading to Evaluate Security - NEWSBTC

Magnr, the Bitcoin savings bank and trading platform recently suspended its activities for a short time to re-evaluate its security features following the Bitfinex incident. The recent incident with Bitcoin has got a lot of Bitcoin companies on high alert. Many digital currency companies have started to re-evaluate their security.
